de.uni_leipzig.mosquito.generation

Class RandomTriple

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_leipzig.mosquito.generation.RandomTriple

  • public class RandomTriple
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by IntelliJ IDEA. User: Mohamed Morsey Date: Sep 29, 2010 Time: 4:32:35 PM This class represents the second methodology of selecting triple, i.e. selecting triples in totally random fashion adjusted by Felix Conrads

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomTriple() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void generateTriple(org.bio_gene.wookie.connection.Connection con)
      Generates a new random triple and stores it into the model, by selecting a random offset each time it is called.
      static long getNumberOfTriples()
      Gets the number of triples.
      static void init(java.lang.String outputFile)
      Initialization
      static void readTriplesFromFile(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.Double percent)
      Reads random triples from and N-triples file The idea is that we read 10 triple from the file and then select some of them at random according to the percentage of instances that should be generated e.g. 10% we should select 1 out of 10, 30% we should select 3 out of 10 and so forth
      static void setGraphURI(java.lang.String graphURI)
      Sets the graph uri.
      static void setOutputFileName(java.lang.String outputFileName)
      Sets the output file name.
      static void setOutputFormat(java.lang.String outputFormat)

      • generateTriple

        public static void generateTriple(org.bio_gene.wookie.connection.Connection con)
        Generates a new random triple and stores it into the model, by selecting a random offset each time it is called.
        Parameters:
        con - Connection to use

      • readTriplesFromFile

        public static void readTriplesFromFile(java.lang.String filename,
                       java.lang.Double percent)
        Reads random triples from and N-triples file The idea is that we read 10 triple from the file and then select some of them at random according to the percentage of instances that should be generated e.g. 10% we should select 1 out of 10, 30% we should select 3 out of 10 and so forth
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename
        percent - the percentage to genrate
